name: Dude No.1 Cologne
description:
Based their deliciously popular beard oil, MCMC offers up this classic manly scent that will make you want to get close.

A blend of three woods - Virginia cedarwood, creamy sandalwood and smoky Haitian vetiver - accented by spicy ginger and pink peppercorn with a heart of Moroccan rose, this fragrance is 100% natural and contains only denatured alcohol, essential oils and absolutes.

And ladies, of course you are going to want to use this scent on yourselves. In fact, we demand it!

1 oz / 30ml

name: Celadon Bowl
description:
Designed by Bo Jia for Middle Kingdom, these thrown porcelain bowls are wonderfully sophisticated yet durable and practical for everyday use. From soup to cereal to sides, you'll be glad to add them to your daily rotation. 5.5"diam.x 3"high
Dishwasher safe

name: Rose Lip Balm
description:
Psst: pucker up friend, your lips need it. 
With a moisturizing and protective blend of almond oil, beeswax, local honey, carrot seed oil, and rose otto essential oil how can you go wrong? Seriously folks, it's what we use and what we love. Try it. You won't regret it.
.15oz

name: Faux Bois Guest Soaps
description:
We love the graphic quality to these little hand soaps. You'll get four perfect squares scented with grapefruit, clementine, and green tea-all housed in a lovely gift box. Perfect for your next hostess, house-warming, or thank you gift. 
Each is 2.5''square and 1.5''high.

name: 2014 Seasonal Produce Calendar
description:
Bison Bookbinding & Letterpress bring us this fabulous calendar for 2014. Featuring the illustrations of Karolin Schnoor, each page offers a monthly fruit or veg printed in charcoal and copper foil. Pages are single sided so prints are easily cut out and frame-worthy. Limited quantity. 

Spiral bound, 12"tall x 6"wide

name: Zig Zag Sparkle Thigh Highs
description:
Holiday's just wouldn't be the holiday's unless you added a little sparkle to your ensemble. This year, let it be on your gams with these fabulous thigh highs from Erica Tanov. Women's size 9-11.
Please hand-wash / line dry
63% cotton, 26% polyamide, 8% polyester, 3% elastine
Made in France

name: Brass Coffee Scoop
description:
If you are a coffee drinker and you had one REALLY special tool in your coffee ritual arsenal, you may want it to be this one. Brought to us by Japanese craftsman Luca Kikuchi, this hand-hammered scoop measures out two tablespoons. Elegant and timeless, each scoop is one-of-a-kind.
5.5" long.

name: Jo Gordon Gloves
description: Famous for her bright, bold knits, Jo Gordon offers up these super-fun striped gloves. 100% Geelong lambswool, they're too soft for their own good! One size, mid-forearm length. Made in Scotland.

name: Porcelain Feather Ornaments
description:
A set of three ever so life-like feather ornaments. Cast in timeless porcelain, they make a thoughtful holiday gift. We especially like tying them individually to the tops of presents.
8", 5", and 4" long. 
each is no more than 2.5" wide

name: Papier Mache Ornaments
description:
Love this year's round of paper ornaments in the shop. Among our favorites are this cow and goose. Fashioned from newsprint and a bit of paint, their playful personalities are sure to add joy to your holiday festivities.

cow: 5"long x 3.5"high (will come with brown or black spots)
goose: 4.5"high x 3.5"wide

name: Cutting/Serving Board
description:
We're so pleased to have these on board--no pun intended. 
Hand-crafted from solid cherry and finished with flaxseed oil, they are beautiful enough to serve your finest cheeses yet durable enough to carve your next roast. We particularly appreciate how the hemp rope tie tucks into the dedicated channel allowing the board to lay flat while in use or just hanging on your wall.
This hard wood it timeless and when cared for properly, will last you a lifetime.

small: 9" x 15"
large: 10" x 18"

name: Stoneware Pie Dish
description:
We're thrilled to bring this on board. Wheel-thrown in Vermont, this beautiful and functional pie dish will surely be handed down from generation to generation. The subtle, organic form is timeless, while the durable stoneware clay promotes even heating and stress-free baking. Pie, quiche, crumble--you name it!

Hand-dipped, lead free glaze. 
Oven, dishwasher, microwave safe.
11"diam. x 2.25"high

name: Kinfolk Magazine-Volume 10
description: This issue is dedicated to all things that get better with time: loved ones, food, family traditions and a good bottle of wine. It explores how the older folks in our lives can teach us how to live and investigates how our lives are enriched by the people, meals and traditions of things past. Everything in this issue gets better, or tastier, with age.

name: Mia Zia Socks-Dots
description:
Loving the new 'dots' addition to the Mia Zia sock family. With a woven knit content of cotton, polyamide and elastine, they’re not only machine washable, but super durable and will last you seasons to come. If anything, they’ll make you smile.
Crew length, womens size 9-11.

name: The Kinfolk Table
description: Continuing Kinfolk's mantra about the way entertaining should be: comfortable, simple, slow and meaningful, The Kinfolk Table is a collection of 85 delectable recipes spread over nearly 400 pages from creative types around the world. Filled with gorgeous photography and design you’re used to seeing in the magazine, the book will inspire your next small gathering. Just in time for the holidays, The Kinfolk Table might just be the perfect gift for the contemplative cook in your life.

name: Japanese Welcome Soap
description:
You're going to be tempted to chomp right into this little fat guy, but don't! It's soap on a rope. Produced by Tamanohada (making all natural soaps since 1892), their welcome soaps take the shape of the red snapper, a traditional symbol of good luck in Japanese culture. Gentle enough for all skin types, it has a clean, mild scent. Housewarmings, holidays, any celebration really-a perfect gift.

10.9oz, 7.5"w x 4"h x 1"thick

name: Fog Linen Tray: Natural
description:
Useful, light-weight serving trays made from linen that has been covered in melamine. 
Not suitable for extreme heat. 
Please hand wash.

small 8.5” x 5"
medium 13" x 9"
large 15.25" x 10.75"

name: PomPom Muffler/Beanie
description:
A bold, bright, and super fun accessory that works double-duty. Wear it as a quirky scarf by securing it with the pompom or as a cheerful hat by doubling it up on itself. 100% lambswool and sooooo warm, your neck will thank you.
**lips not included

Made in Scotland

name: Fog Linen Calendar Cloth-Pear
description:
Your next collecting addiction.
Loving the collaboration between Fog Linen and Tokyo based illustrator Mayumi Kichihiro for a new round of 2014 calendar cloths. Other than making great holiday gifts, these are perfect for commemorating any special occasion lined up for 2014.
 
100% linen, 25.5"long x 17.5"wide
Machine wash and dry

name: Fog Linen Tray: White/Blue Stripe
description:
Useful, light-weight serving trays made from linen that has been covered in melamine. 
Not suitable for extreme heat. 
Please hand wash.

small 8.5” x 5"
medium 13" x 9"
large 15.25" x 10.75"

name: Fog Linen Tray: Navy Check
description:
Useful, light-weight serving trays made from linen that has been covered in melamine. 
Not suitable for extreme heat. 
Please hand wash.

small 8.5” x 5"
medium 13" x 9"
large 15.25" x 10.75"

name: Cotton Herringbone Throw
description:
Brushed cotton throw blanket with subtle ivory/honey herringbone weave. Soft, soft, so soft, and finished with a twisted, natural fringe. 
Caution: family members may fight over this one.
100% cotton, made in portugal, 51" x 71"
machine wash cold/gentle
tumble dry on low heat

name: Wooden Cutlery
description: Our birch wood cutlery is a great biodegradable option for disposable flatware. Picnics, office, glove compartment. Shoot, you can use it as kindling for your campfire this Summer. You'll get 36 pieces in each pouch: 12 forks, 12 knives, and 12 spoons.

name: 'Eclipse' Bottle Opener
description:
Designed by Masanori Oji, the eclipse bottle opener is uniquely planned to fit the palm of your hand while maintaining an easy grip when opening a bottle. Cast in 100% brass, it's surface is slightly raw, it's form is timeless and elegant. Comes packaged in a tidy box.

Approx. 3"l x 2-3/8"w x 1/4"h 
Made in Japan, Hand wash.

name: Cotton Napkins
description:
A set of six hand-loomed napkins with a subtle and beautiful woven design. We love the softness and the casual fraying of edges. Use them daily. Actually, it will be hard not to.
 
100% cotton, 15"square
Machine wash cool/tumble dry low or line dry

name: Theo Cotton Blanket
description:
Talented designer Anki Spets wows us again this season with her latest textile delight. This Full/Queen blanket is woven of soft and cozy mid-weight cotton. The palette is a mix of whites, greys, browns, and will easily compliment any decor. Made in Portugal.

machine wash warm gentle cycle
tumble dry low, remove promptly

name: Mia Zia Scarves
description:
Mia Zia delivers these smashing scarves in super fine wool and punchy stripes--their signature. Each measures 8.5" x 61" and is constructed of 100% Italian Merino Wool.

hand wash cold / lay flat to dry

name: Ace & Jig Vintage Tee
description:
Relaxed fit tee in A&J's signature beefy double-gauze cotton called Domino. The rounded neck features a back button placket and there is a handy front chest pocket. Hits just below the hip.
100% cotton. 
Hand wash cold separately / dry flat or dryclean

name: Rose Geranium Soothing Mist
description:
A Summertime essential from Naturopathica. This refreshing blend of soothing Rose Geranium and Aloe Vera helps tone and condition the skin while calming the senses.
 
Key Ingredients:
Rose geranium flower water: hydrosol waters that sooth and hydrate
Larch extract: aids in moisturization and enhances skin radiance
Geranium essential oil: uplifting and all-over balancing effects

4.2 fl.oz.

name: Super Ted
description:
Super Ted!! We love these hand-sewn masked marvels by Kathryn Davey. Each Ted is made up with linen and filled with bio-degradable sustainable fiber filling. His removable cape and mask are 100% Merino wool felt.  
Ted is 10" high in case you're wondering.

name: Spoon and Spat Set
description:
Carved out of beautiful olive wood, this spoon and spatula duo is not only smooth and pleasing to hold, but pretty darn useful. They sure to become your go-to utensils and you may just find yourself foisting them upon your friends and family.

hand-wash with mild soapy water
spoon: 10.5 long, 3.25" at widest point
spatula: 12" long, 2.75" at widest point

name: Snaps Ginger Cookies
description:
Serving up a sassy version of this classic cookie, Bunches and Bunches brings us these scrumptious ginger crisps that have the perfect combination of sugar, spice and snap. Snaps are 100% natural and contain NO preservatives. Hand-made and packaged with care in Portland, OR. May you fall madly in love at first bite. Snap!

Approx. 24 ginger cookies per container. Net Wt. 8 oz (23g)

name: Long Zip Pouch
description:
Brought to you by Tracey Tanner, these long flat zip-top pouches are perfect for everything from pens to makeup brushes. But do we even need to highlight these lovely leathers? Use them as a schnazzy clutch on your next evening outing.
 
11"wide x 4.5"high.
*contents in pic not included.

name: Jo Gordon Plain Hat
description:
100% Geelong lambswool make this hat not only warm, but the softest thing to hug your head since...ever. The shape and colorways are timeless and they'll fit your best guy or gal. Fully unfurled, each hat is 12.5" long so you can get a full 'slouch' on if that's the way you like it.
Made in Scotland.

name: Calendula Hydrating Creme
description:
Hands down, our favorite face creme.
Brought to you by the talented team at Naturopathica, this moisture drench cream contains Calendula, traditionally used to soothe ultra dry or sensitive skin in need of nourishing hydration. For which skin type? Normal to dry. And a word about our star ingredient: calendula is traditionally known as a wound-healing herb, this botanical contains properties to reduce inflammation and soothe irritation. A word from the folks at pod: you won't be disappointed.
1.7oz

name: Fog Linen Full Apron
description:
A classic and handsome apron that provides full coverage—even for the messiest cook, crafter, or server in your life. Functional and long-lasting, two handy pockets are placed in front for tools, utensils, and, of course, tired hands.
36"wide x 38"long
Machine wash cool/tumble dry low or line dry

name: Jo Gordon Tie-Bow Scarf
description:
Definitely not to be confused with the fitness craze that swept the 90's, this 'tie-bow' scarf from the talented Jo Gordon, is adorable, clever, and super warm. Knit of 100% Geelong lambswool, you'll wrap it around twice and fix with its end strings as artfully as you wish.
Made in Scotland, 42"long x 11"wide

name: Micaela Greg: Ripple Sweater
description:
We love the Fall knits by the sisterly design duo that is Micaela Greg.
This is a marled merino wool sweater with a ripple texture detail at the neck and sleeve opening. Radiating triangular pointelle pattern on the front and back. Short dolman sleeve and hem that is longer in the back. 

100% Extra Fine Italian Merino Wool
Hand wash in cold water

name: Two-Ply Striped Linen Towels
description:
Surprisingly lightweight and extra thirsty linen towels from the good folks at Good Linens. Other than the juicy two-ply weave, we love the faded black striping against un-bleached linen. Useful, timeless, and beautiful. Just like we like them.

wash cloth 9.5" x 9.5"
hand towel 21" x 21"
bath towel 57" x 31"

100% linen
machine wash/dry gently

name: A&J Provencal Scarf-Sun
description:
Putting anything on by Ace and Jig simply feels like one big hug. Made of their now signature double woven cotton, this Provencal scarf may just become your new security blanket. Don't worry, we won't call you Linus.
92.5% cotton, 7% modal, .5% metallic, made in India. 
Hand wash cold, line dry.
31" x 56"

name: Pinstripe Linen Pillowcases
description:
Long lasting, classic linen pillowcases with an indigo pinstripe detail. You'll receive a standard sized pair of bag-style cases that are sure to spruce up any bedding ensemble. Wedding season is on the way. Great gift? Just saying. 100% linen.
Please machine wash/dry gently.

name: Kinfolk Magazine-Volume 8
description:
This eighth issue is a glimpse of Japan through the Kinfolk lens. Some of the wonderful articles include:  
• Interviews with Eatrip’s Yuri Nomura, ceramic artist Ryota Aoki and Fog Linen’s Yumiko Sekine.
• Profiles of Oakland’s Ramen Shop, the duo behind L.A.’s Tortoise & Tortoise General Store, and Tokyo coffee shops.
• Recipes for Cherry Blossom Macarons with Black Sesame, Salt-Pickled Napa Cabbage, Wakame Cucumber Salad, Red Bean Mochi and Matcha.
And More!

name: Kinfolk Magazine-Volume 9
description: Kinfolk Issue 9 is a celebration of weekends. How do you define your weekend? Do weekends still exist? Are you able to unplug from your phones and computers and engage non-digitally? Whether you’re reveling in the great outdoors, doing some marathon baking or just lounging on the couch, this issue is the guide to striking the right balance and making the most of our well-earned days off. The folks at Kinfolk have been digging deep on the subject of weekends and leisure to re-learn how to do nothing, live more adventurously and embrace those two days.

name: Chelsea Clog/Boot
description:
New from Swedish Hasbeens, this super cute clog/boot features stitched eyelet detail, elasticized paneling for comfort, and a rubber sole along the bottom of the platform heel. Bordeaux leather upper with wooden bottom. Whole sizes only.

*orig. 240.00

name: Hand-Painted Linen Cushions
description:
Brought to you by one of our favorites: Margarete Hausler.
Cushions are 100% linen and feature gradient hues hand-painted
with textile friendly mineral pigments. Measuring 23.5" x 12", there is an envelope closure on the back with brown leather ribbons. Each cushion is one of a kind and will come with a premium down stuffer.

Hand-wash in cold with mild detergent.

name: Fog Linen Kitchen Cloth 3.0
description:
Made in Lithuania, these long lasting linen kitchen towels will only get softer and more absorbent with each wash. Each is a generous 25.5’’long x 17.5’’wide and comes with a nifty cotton loop for easy hang-dry.
Machine wash and dry
*If there's a style you don't see here, just ask. We may have it in our shop.

name: Fog Linen Thick Chambray Bath Towel
description:
Thick, long-lasting, and absorbent bath towels. Each towel measures approximately 29.5" x 57" and has a handy loop sewn in for hanging. 100% linen.
Machine wash/dry gently.
*hint: put these in the dryer. they are going to shrink up a bit, but that's what makes these even better!

name: Paper Flower Garland
description: We can't even control ourselves over this special garland. Hand-made paper rosettes with mica glitter all strung on natural twine. Ten feet of magic! Not just for holiday's, you'll want this around all year to make your heart flutter. Made in USA.

name: Fog Linen Midi Apron
description:
A new apron length from Fog, the 'midi', is perfect for when you need coverage, but not full-on coverage. Functional and long-lasting, two handy pockets are placed in front for tools, utensils, and, of course, tired hands. 
36" wide x 21" long
Machine wash cool/tumble dry low or line dry

name: Sugar Coat
description:
Pip, Pip, Hooray! Double layer cotton sugar coat from PIpsqueak Chapeau. This beauty features a two button closure, side pockets, and a nice little swing. 100% hand-dyed cotton. 
Wash cool / Dry on low.
*orig. 385.00

name: Erica Tanov Cotton Quilt
description:
Hand-stitched queen quilt made in India of 100% cotton. This 'wave' print is part of a collaboration with Bay Area Artist Emily Payne. 
Machine wash on cool, gentle cycle. Line dry.
Queen size.

name: Erica Tanov Cotton Pillowcases
description:
Soft cotton cases in original prints from Erica Tanov. You'll receive one pair of standard cases measuring 20" x 27". 
Made in India of 100% cotton. 

Machine wash gentle cold cycle/dry on cool or line dry.

name: Fog Linen Thick Chambray Hand Towel
description:
Thick, long-lasting, and absorbent hand towels. Each towel measures approximately 18" x25" and has a handy loop sewn in for hanging. 100% linen.
Machine wash/dry gently.
*hint: put these in the dryer. they are going to shrink up a bit, but that's what makes these even better!

name: Stoneware Pantry Bowl
description:
Mixing ingredients, raising dough, or just holding fruit, this vessel functions while standing out as a special hand made item in your home. Wheel-thrown in Vermont, the subtle, organic form is timeless, while the durable stoneware makes it rugged enough for even the toughest of kitchens. A perfect wedding our housewarming gift.

Hand-dipped, lead free glaze. 
Oven, dishwasher, microwave safe.
9"diam. x 5"high

name: Double Gourd Vase
description:
Kapow! This metallic gold vase really packs a wallop. Reaching a mere
5" in height, we love it's substantial little form and we hope you do too.
Looks even more stunning accompanied by your favorite bloom.
Porcelain. Hand wash.
3" max. diameter

name: Stoneware Serving Bowl
description:
Collect, mix, dole out, share! Wheel-thrown in Vermont, this beautiful and functional serving bowl will surely be handed down from generation to generation. The subtle, organic form is timeless, while the durable stoneware makes it rugged enough for even the toughest of kitchens. A perfect wedding our housewarming gift.

Hand-dipped, lead free glaze. 
Oven, dishwasher, microwave safe.
11"diam. x 4"high

name: Bailey's Dog Biscuits
description:
Brought to by the folks at Bunches & Bunches in Portland, OR, these hand-made biscuits are sure to keep your pup's tail a waggin'. 100% natural, the goodness they contain includes: whole wheat flour, cracked wheat, chicken broth, all-purpose flour, wheat germ, corn meal, powdered dry milk, water, egg, butter, honey, yeast, and lots of love.
They're healthy, fun, and we ask that you dole them out liberally.

2.2lbs

name: Fog Linen Tuz Fringe Scarf
description:
The Tuz is quickly becoming a Fog classic. Generously sized but without the bulk, it becomes softer with each wash and wear. Easily your year-round go to. Soft selvedge fray along three sides.

73cm W x 169cm L / 29" x 66"
100% linen / made in Lithuania
Machine wash cool/tumble dry low or line dry

name: Fog Linen Waffle Towels
description:
Based on traditional European bath towels, Fog has created a waffle weave using raw linen from Lithuania. We know, we’ve said it before but these are truly long lasting towels and will only get softer and more absorbent with each wash. Plus, the waffle texture serves to gently exfoliate as you dry.
bath:29’’x48’’
hand:13.5"x29"
wash:9.5"square
Machine wash and dry

name: Painted Chinese Lanterns
description:
Whimsical, romantic, fun, and just plain lovely. Chinese lanterns in different permutations are a perrenial here at the shop. For now, we offer you these beauties in three shapes. If you wish to illuminate, we suggest nothing above 25 watts.
Approx. 12'' high.

name: Gold Foil Postcards
description:
Shiny! Spectacular! You'll receive a set of three gold foil stamped postcards in a tidy little package--one each of the anchor, horseshoe, and arrow. Brought to us by the e&a creative duo, each card is printed on heavy-duty recycled paperboard and is approximately 4.25" x 6".
Send a postcard today! It's much more thoughtful than a crummy 'ol email.

name: Fog Linen Kitchen Cloth 1.0
description:
Made in Lithuania, these long lasting linen kitchen towels will only get softer and more absorbent with each wash. Each is a generous 25.5’’long x 17.5’’wide and comes with a nifty cotton loop for easy hang-dry.
Machine wash and dry.
*If there's a style you don't see here, just ask. We may have it in our shop.

name: Everyday Hoops
description:
We love the quiet sophistication of these organic hand-hammered brass loops. From the talented Jen Goff of Takara, each pair is one of kind and measures 2.5" in diameter-give or take an eighth or so. As these are hand-crafted, please expect slight variations in shape.
Post is 14K gold fill. Very light-weight.

name: Tasting Spoons: Set of 6
description: Rosewood, robles, mamales, coconut, mahogany, and bayong spoons bring utilitarian beauty to any kitchen. Each mixed set of six tasting spoons is hand-crafted and smoothed with a food-safe vegetable oil finish. 11.75"long. Please hand wash.

name: Kaico Milk Pan
description:
Milk, sauces, and more. If you're a fan of award-winning contemporary Japanese design, this is the pan to add to your cooking ensemble. Designed by Makoto Koizumi, it is crafted in enamel over steel with a contrasting maple handle. The flat base is perfect for balanced heating and is safe to use on all stovetops.
10"L x 3.5"h x 5"diam., 0.92L/31oz.
Please hand wash with warm soapy water.

name: Fog Linen Kitchen Cloth 2.0
description:
Made in Lithuania, these long lasting linen kitchen towels will only get softer and more absorbent with each wash. Each is a generous 25.5’’long x 17.5’’wide and comes with a nifty cotton loop for easy hang-dry.
Machine wash and dry
*If there's a style you don't see here, just ask. We may have it in our shop.

name: Cotton Waffle Weave Towel-Ivory
description:
Quickly becoming favorites around here, these rustic waffle weave bath towels are the bomb. They are soft, puckery, absorbent, and they dry fast. Plus, the waffle texture will give you a little added exfoliation leaving you bright and shiny for the day ahead. 100% cotton.
Machine wash/dry
24" x 58"

name: Coffee Spoon
description:
A special litte addition to your coffee ritual. Each spoon is 18/10 stainless steel with a brushed gold finish. 
4.25", dishwasher safe.

name: Animal Masks
description: For any 'ol playtime scenario. Screen-printed canvas masks with surged edges and cotton twill ties. Fits big kids and little kids.

name: Fog Linen Scrubby Mitt
description:
A welcomed addition to your bathing ritual. Not only is linen is a naturally bacteria-resistant material, the looped texture will gently exfoliate and massage your body.
Machine wash and dry
8"h x 6"w

name: Saipua Soaps
description:
Saippua: Finnish for soap. 
Created by a family run operation in New York, these gentle, olive oil based soaps are carefully crafted in small batches using food-grade vegetable oils, butters and custom-blended herbs and essential oils. Each bar is hand-cut and air-dried. 
Suds up! We hope you enjoy them as much as we do.
4 oz.

name: Cotton Waffle Weave Towel-White
description:
Quickly becoming favorites around here, these rustic waffle weave bath towels are the bomb. They are soft, puckery, absorbent, and they dry fast. Plus, the waffle texture will give you a little added exfoliation leaving you bright and shiny for the day ahead. 100% cotton.
Machine wash/dry
27" x 56"

name: Beeswax Candles-8oz
description:
Eight ounces of pure beeswax-- plain, or with 100% essential oils.
You choose. Clean, calming, all natural. 
Burn time: 50 hours.

name: 12" Beeswax Tapers
description: Beeswax is a sweet, simple, renewable fuel that burns long and bright. It’s not only non-toxic, but hypo allergenic too. Each pair of our hand-dipped tapers are 100% and carry the rich scent of honey. You’ll be sure to enjoy their warm, long-lasting glow. Kept out of drafts and away from fans, these tapers will burn virtually dripless.

name: All Purpose Glass: Set of 6
description:
Juice, water, wine, flowers, toothbrushes -you name it. This functional 8oz. vessel will handle it all. Hey, suitable for hot liquids too. You'll receive a set of 6.
4”high x 2.75”diam.
Dishwasher safe.

name: Pod's Favorite White Bowl
description:
That's right-- it's our favorite and we stock it year round. A generous, Japanese porcelain vessel that is suitable for huge ice-cream sundaes, soups, sides, flowers, and more. Its timeless design is sure to compliment any decor.
5.75''diam. x 4''high
dishwasher/microwave safe

name: Fog Linen Daily Apron
description:
Made from raw linen from Lithuania, this apron is classic in design and function. Perfect for the cook or crafter in your life, the long lasting linen will only get softer and more absorbent with each wash. One handy pocket is placed in front for utensils, tools, or tired hands. Though it provides full frontal coverage, we love the shorter lenghth which allows easy movement. 
Machine wash cool/tumble dry low or line dry

name: Handmade Home
description: In Handmade Home Mark and Sally Bailey turn their attention to the inspirational real-life homes of artists, craftspeople and designers or those who collect their work. Living with paintings, sculptures, ceramics and textiles – almost anything crafted by hand, in fact – will give your home an originality that is welcome in this age of mass production. Handmade Home is a celebration of handcrafted objects made with love, care and concentration, showing how such items can become the inspiration for decorative schemes full of originality and soul.

name: Fog Linen Kitchen Cloth 4.0
description:
Made in Lithuania, these long lasting linen kitchen towels will only get softer and more absorbent with each wash. Each is a generous 25.5’’long x 17.5’’wide and comes with a nifty cotton loop for easy hang-dry.
Machine wash and dry
*If there's a style you don't see here, just ask. We may have it in our shop.

name: Simple Home
description: A super reference for your 'inspirations' library, Simple Home promotes a calm and uncluttered home, with each item carefully chosen. It's in tune with the desire to purchase well-made, well-designed items that will grow old gracefully, and to create homes that are sustainable and stylish. Not a minimalist manifesto, Simple Home is about living in comfort in a carefully considered space.

name: Cotton Ruffle Pillowcases
description:
Ok, times are tough and perhaps you can't splurge on a whole new bedding ensemble, but you can do this. Crisp, white, 100% cotton pillowcases with a delicate ruffle trim. They're sure to brighten up any tired old bedroom and will certainly cheer you up as you head to dreamland. We sell them in pairs. 
Standard size.
Machine wash/dry.

name: Fog Linen Baby Blanket
description:
A beautiful, 100% cotton knit blanket for the new baby in your life. Soft, dye-free, naturally ivory, you'll wish they made this in grown-up sizes.
Machine wash/dry gently-or line dry.
30"x40"

name: Gold-Leafed Lotus
description:
Tiny gold lotus + one tiny tea-light = luminosity. Alone or in groups the glimmer is ambient and glorious and you’ll be a hero to give one as a gift this holiday season or any time for that matter. Not food safe. 
5"diam. x 2"high

name: Lavender Body Butter
description:
A staple here at the shop. Simply, a tub of the creamiest, thickest and most emollient substance you’ll ever rub into your skin. Enriched with shea butter and essential oil of lavender, this is best used right after a steamy shower or bath. 
16.9 fl.oz.

name: Hammam Bath Sheet
description:
A sizable bath sheet made of 100% Egyptian Cotton. We love how it retains the distinctive quality of old-time bath linen. Light and absorbent, it traditionally envelops the bather after a long steam in a Hammam. Each measures a generous 78"x36".
Machine wash/dry

name: Roli-Poli Glass
description:
Big and round, this hand-blown glass is suitable as a tumbler or to hold a votive candle. A great alternative to other stemless wine goblets.
Approximately 3"high x 3"diam,  please hand-wash.

name: Round Wire Bushel
description:
Based on an old-fashioned potato basket, this wire bushel will come in handy for fire-wood, newspapers/mags, tp in the br, and of course, potatoes. You chose! Constructed of durable, galvanized, heavy guage wire with two handles.
10''h x 14.5''diam.

name: Fog Linen Bath Mat
description:
An easy addition to any bathroom. Not only is linen is a naturally bacteria-resistant material, the looped texture will gently exfoliate and massage your feet.
Machine wash and dry
25"x17"

name: Beeswax Tealights
description: Always a good idea to have a bunch of tealights around--even better if they're beeswax. These come in a pack of six and will burn for over 5 hours. The clear cup allows you to see their warm glow the whole time and provides for easy clean up. No wax scraping here!

name: Fog Linen Tablecloth  51"x71"
description:
Made in Lithuania, these long lasting linen tablecloths will only get softer with each wash. As with all Fog items, we are proud to share such practicality, simplicity and durability.
51"x71"
Machine wash and dry gently.

name: Glass 7.5oz: Set of 4
description:
Produced in Spain, this glassware is all that you will probably need. Simple, elegant and useful. Dishwasher safe.
Set of 4, 2.25"h x 3"diam.
7.5 ounces each.

name: Glass 12oz: Set of 4
description:
Produced in Spain, this glassware is all that you will probably need. Simple, elegant and useful. Dishwasher safe.
set of 4, 3.5"h  x 3.25"diam.
12 ounces each

name: Fog Linen Cross Apron
description:
Made from raw linen from Lithuania, this apron is classic in design and function. Slip it over your head and it will nicely drape into a criss cross fit along the back. A little more feminine, a little more casual, the long lasting linen will only get softer and more absorbent with each wash. 43"wide x 31"long
Machine wash cool/tumble dry low or line dry
